attr.title: Arco
attr.desc: A Mesoamerican fantasy RPG that blends turn-based and real-time combat. Explore the world through three handcrafted stories forged in bloodshed, laced with magic, and united by revenge.
attr.desc_md:
A Mesoamerican fantasy RPG that blends turn-based and real-time combat. Explore the world through three handcrafted stories forged in bloodshed, laced with magic, and united by revenge.

**Note: This game has been patched to use L2 to swap between D-pad and L-stick for D-pad only devices**
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam. Download the game and copy arco.exe to ports/arco.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2366970/Arco/). Download the game and copy arco.exe to ports/arco.
